Dr. Eduard Matito

Position: Leader

Email: ematito@gmail.com

Website: https://ematito.dipc.org

Education

  • 2006: Ph.D. in Chemistry; thesis supervised by Prof. Miquel Solà i Puig and Prof. Miquel Duran i Portas, Universitat de Girona, Girona, Spain.
  • 2004: M.S. in Chemistry, University of Girona, Girona, Spain.
  • 2002: B.S. in Chemistry, Universitat de Girona, Girona, Spain.

Experience

  • Since Mar. 2020: Ikerbasque Associate Researcher at the Donostia International Physics Center (DIPC).
  • Feb. 2018 – Mar. 2020: Ikerbasque Research Fellow at the Donostia International Physics Center (DIPC).
  • Apr. 2015 – Feb. 2018: Ikerbasque Research Fellow at the UPV/EHU and the Donostia International Physics Center (DIPC).
  • Dec. 2011 - Mar. 2015: Junior Group Leader, IQCC, UdG.
  • Apr. 2011 - Nov. 2011: Postdoctoral position, Kimika Fakultatea, Euskal Herriko Unibertsitatea, (UPV/EHU) Donostia [Spain](Supervisor: Prof. J. Ugalde).
  • Apr. 2009 - Mar. 2011: Marie Curie IEF postdoctoral fellow. Institute of Physics, USz.(Supervisor: Prof. J. Cioslowski).
  • Sep. 2007 - Mar. 2009: Postdoctoral position, Univ. Aarhus [Denmark](Supervisor: Prof. O. Christiansen).
  • Jan. 2007 - Sep. 2007: Project Manager.IQC, UdG.
  • Aug. 2006 - Dec. 2006: Postdoctoral Visitor. Institute of Physics, Univ. Szczecin (USz) [Poland](Supervisor: Prof. Jerzy Cioslowski).
